channel.title: Shop requirements
channel.description:
Okay, well, I want to add requirements to a shop. I want to make it so if (playerIsMember == 1) allows you to buy. I want people with if (playerIsMember == 0) to be able to trade but not to buy.
thanks in advance.

item.title: Shop requirements
item.dc:creator: @Recharge Recharge
item.description:
@Recharge wrote:

Method buyItem…Don’t disable anyone from viewing the shop.

Read full topic

item.title: Shop requirements
item.dc:creator: @pk3r_john pk3r john
item.description:
@pk3r_john wrote:

grayfoxx:

this is looking pretty complicated… uh maybe you should make the npc in a members area… idk man this is complicated sounding to me… sorry i could not help. BUT IT CAN BE DONE!

are u fucking serious its not THAT complicated i think u just put it in your wanneshop but anyways: you just have to put this: if(donator == 1) { into the wanneshop (I think)
and then just put the

} else {
sendMessage ("You must be a donator to enter this shop");

Good luck.

EDIT: Sorry its late here so i cant think :S

Read full topic

item.title: Shop requirements
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

if(NPCID == ####) { if(donator == 1) { PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = #; } else { sM("Message."); } } }

Read full topic

item.title: Shop requirements
item.dc:creator: @noobie22 Noobie22
item.description:
@noobie22 wrote:

if (NPCID == ####) { if(donator == 1) { PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = #; } else sM("You must be donator to access this shop, noob!"); }

Just use donator, it will save so much time.

Read full topic
